Are you worried I might do well?\""},{"lineNumber":9344,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺が上手くやるかもしれんと怖くなったのか","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":9345,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、いや……プレゼントの花がな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no... it's just that the gift flower,"},{"lineNumber":9346,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無駄になっちまったな、とね」","translatedEnglishLine":"ended up wasted.\""},{"lineNumber":9347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「花だと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A flower?\""},{"lineNumber":9348,"originalJapaneseLine":"サイアスは懐から、蕾のままの花を一輪、","translatedEnglishLine":"Syuss took out a single flower still in bud from his pocket,"},{"lineNumber":9349,"originalJapaneseLine":"取りだして眺めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and gazed at it."},{"lineNumber":9350,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自作の品種なんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a breed I created myself."},{"lineNumber":9351,"originalJapaneseLine":"　青い髪に、映える花……名は薄氷、ってとこか」","translatedEnglishLine":"A flower that stands out against blue hair... the name is 'Thin Ice', I suppose.\""},{"lineNumber":9352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かーーーーっ！　このきざきざ野郎が！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahhh! You pretentious bastard!\""},{"lineNumber":9353,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、花が咲くのは明日一日だけなんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But the flower only blooms for one day tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":9354,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回はパスだな…………要るか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll pass this time... do you want it?\""},{"lineNumber":9355,"originalJapaneseLine":"「要らんわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No thanks!\""},{"lineNumber":9356,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス宮殿、司令室――","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth Palace, Command Room——"},{"lineNumber":9357,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ、は――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this is——\""},{"lineNumber":9358,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス四天王にして、ゼス全軍を統括する","translatedEnglishLine":"Chizuruko Yamada, one of the Zeth Four Heavenly Kings and commander of all Zeth forces,"},{"lineNumber":9359,"originalJapaneseLine":"山田千鶴子は、報告書を見て色を変えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"changed color upon seeing the report."},{"lineNumber":9360,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらく無かった、東部戦線の再侵攻。","translatedEnglishLine":"The long-awaited re-invasion of the Eastern Front."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かるんだけどな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand that, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、お前、帰るの明日にしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, you postpone going home until tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいが……どういう風の吹き回しだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fine... but what's gotten into you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、さっきの子の失恋を癒してやるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, to help heal the heartbreak of that girl from earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドでな。じゃあな、がはははははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In bed, of course. Well then, hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもの笑いを上げながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With his usual laughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは女の子が去っていった方に駆けていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance ran towards the direction the girl had left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相っ変わらずな奴……ま、いいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's the same as always... well, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ自身は殺しても死ななさそうだし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He himself seems like he wouldn't die even if killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薄れた陰を振り払い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking off the fading shadow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスは口元を緩めて自室へと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss relaxed his mouth and went back to his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウスピラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uspira!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラ・真冬を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling out to Uspira Mafuyu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアス・クラウンが呼び止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss Crown stopped her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、デートしないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Would you like to go on a date tomorrow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、って…………無理よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tomorrow... that's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃こそ無いけど、重要な軍議があるじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no sortie, but there's an important military meeting, isn't there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこをなんとか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイアス。私もあなたも、それどころじゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Syuss. Neither you nor I are in a position for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは分かっているでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You understand that, don't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……それは、そうなんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... that's true, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「立場と、するべき任務を放り出す人とは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't spend my day off with someone who throws away their position and duty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休日を共にする気にはなれないわ、クラウン将軍」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Crown."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "氷"の二つ名の通り、冷ややかに言い残して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: True to her nickname 'Ice', she spoke coldly and left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラは去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uspira walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きついね、ウスピラ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's harsh, Uspira...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、無視や無感情よりはいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I guess it's better than being ignored or treated coldly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　やーい、フラれたフラれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahahahaha! Hey-yo, he got rejected, he got rejected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざまあないな、キザ野郎！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Serves you right, you pretentious jerk!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボーヤか……ま、いつもの事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The brat, huh... well, it's the usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気にしちゃいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ……あの様子だと、ウスピラはフリーか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm... judging by that, Uspira is single.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、俺が貰おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll take her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、それは難しいと思うがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I think that's going to be difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、フラれムシの遠吠えだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, just the distant howling of a rejected loser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様と俺様では魅力が違うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your charm and mine are entirely different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、やってみるといいさ。塩は送らないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, go ahead and try. I won't offer any consolation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （しかしウスピラ……いつにも増して余裕がないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But Uspira... she seems more tense than usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根を詰め過ぎじゃないのか……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't she overworking herself...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんだどうかしたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's the matter? Are you worried I might do well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が上手くやるかもしれんと怖くなったのか
「ああ、いや……プレゼントの花がな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no... it's just that the gift flower,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄になっちまったな、とね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ended up wasted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「花だと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A flower?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスは懐から、蕾のままの花を一輪、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss took out a single flower still in bud from his pocket,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取りだして眺めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gazed at it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自作の品種なんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a breed I created myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青い髪に、映える花……名は薄氷、ってとこか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flower that stands out against blue hair... the name is 'Thin Ice', I suppose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かーーーーっ！　このきざきざ野郎が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahhh! You pretentious bastard!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、花が咲くのは明日一日だけなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the flower only blooms for one day tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回はパスだな…………要るか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll pass this time... do you want it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要らんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No thanks!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス宮殿、司令室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Palace, Command Room——
"Th-this is——"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス四天王にして、ゼス全軍を統括する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko Yamada, one of the Zeth Four Heavenly Kings and commander of all Zeth forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山田千鶴子は、報告書を見て色を変えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: changed color upon seeing the report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく無かった、東部戦線の再侵攻。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The long-awaited re-invasion of the Eastern Front.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 分かるんだけどな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand that, though...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よし、お前、帰るの明日にしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, you postpone going home until tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいが……どういう風の吹き回しだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fine... but what's gotten into you?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もちろん、さっきの子の失恋を癒してやるのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, to help heal the heartbreak of that girl from earlier.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドでな。じゃあな、がはははははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In bed, of course. Well then, hahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつもの笑いを上げながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With his usual laughter,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは女の子が去っていった方に駆けていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance ran towards the direction the girl had left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「相っ変わらずな奴……ま、いいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's the same as always... well, whatever.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あいつ自身は殺しても死ななさそうだし……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He himself seems like he wouldn't die even if killed...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 薄れた陰を振り払い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaking off the fading shadow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスは口元を緩めて自室へと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss relaxed his mouth and went back to his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウスピラ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Uspira!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラ・真冬を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Calling out to Uspira Mafuyu,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアス・クラウンが呼び止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss Crown stopped her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうしたの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、デートしないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Would you like to go on a date tomorrow?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日、って…………無理よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tomorrow... that's impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出撃こそ無いけど、重要な軍議があるじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no sortie, but there's an important military meeting, isn't there?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこをなんとか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Please, somehow!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サイアス。私もあなたも、それどころじゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Syuss. Neither you nor I are in a position for that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは分かっているでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You understand that, don't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん……それは、そうなんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... that's true, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「立場と、するべき任務を放り出す人とは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I can't spend my day off with someone who throws away their position and duty,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 休日を共にする気にはなれないわ、クラウン将軍」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Crown."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: "氷"の二つ名の通り、冷ややかに言い残して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: True to her nickname 'Ice', she spoke coldly and left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウスピラは去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uspira walked away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「きついね、ウスピラ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's harsh, Uspira...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、無視や無感情よりはいいか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, I guess it's better than being ignored or treated coldly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははは！　やーい、フラれたフラれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahahahaha! Hey-yo, he got rejected, he got rejected.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざまあないな、キザ野郎！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Serves you right, you pretentious jerk!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ボーヤか……ま、いつもの事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The brat, huh... well, it's the usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気にしちゃいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't care."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむふむ……あの様子だと、ウスピラはフリーか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm hmm... judging by that, Uspira is single.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よーし、俺が貰おう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'll take her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、それは難しいと思うがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I think that's going to be difficult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん、フラれムシの遠吠えだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, just the distant howling of a rejected loser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様と俺様では魅力が違うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your charm and mine are entirely different."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、やってみるといいさ。塩は送らないぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, go ahead and try. I won't offer any consolation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （しかしウスピラ……いつにも増して余裕がないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (But Uspira... she seems more tense than usual.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根を詰め過ぎじゃないのか……？）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't she overworking herself...?)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん？　なんだどうかしたのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hm? What's the matter? Are you worried I might do well?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が上手くやるかもしれんと怖くなったのか
「ああ、いや……プレゼントの花がな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, no... it's just that the gift flower,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無駄になっちまったな、とね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ended up wasted."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「花だと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A flower?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サイアスは懐から、蕾のままの花を一輪、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syuss took out a single flower still in bud from his pocket,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取りだして眺めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gazed at it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自作の品種なんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a breed I created myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青い髪に、映える花……名は薄氷、ってとこか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A flower that stands out against blue hair... the name is 'Thin Ice', I suppose."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「かーーーーっ！　このきざきざ野郎が！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahhh! You pretentious bastard!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、花が咲くのは明日一日だけなんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But the flower only blooms for one day tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回はパスだな…………要るか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll pass this time... do you want it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「要らんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No thanks!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス宮殿、司令室――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth Palace, Command Room——
"Th-this is——"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス四天王にして、ゼス全軍を統括する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chizuruko Yamada, one of the Zeth Four Heavenly Kings and commander of all Zeth forces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山田千鶴子は、報告書を見て色を変えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: changed color upon seeing the report.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらく無かった、東部戦線の再侵攻。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The long-awaited re-invasion of the Eastern Front.
